# Schwarzenbach am Wald__disambig_1

Schwarzenbach am Wald (, ) is a town in the district of Hof, in Bavaria, Germany. It is situated 21 km west of Hof, and 23 km northeast of Kulmbach.
Geography
Geographical situation
Schwarzenbach am Wald is situated in a natural environment at the bottom of the Döbraberg in the Frankenwald natural park.
